title: Group portrait of groom, wearing dark bow tie, and bride standing, wearing light colored lace headpiece, earrings, four strand necklace, long sleeved wedding gown with light colored floral lace over lay, corsage with ribbon on right breast, short floral lace fingerless gloves, and ring on left hand, gathered behind table with three tiered wedding cake in interior with light colored geometrically patterned wallpaper, possibly at 1705 Arcena Street in the Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
